text: Ithi, “ngakube nikubonile yini lokho uMvelinqangi akwehlisela phansi kunina okuyisabelo ngakho-ke nabe senenza (ingxenye) yako yangabi semthethweni (nengxenye yako) nayenza yaba semthethweni” ithi, “ngakube uMvelinqangi owaninika imvume (yokwenza lokho) noma niqamba (amanga) ngoMvelinqangi na?”
